descript.abstract:
This feature class contains service area polygons for each Community Water System (CWS). To determine the service area, ADWR utilized primary data provided directly from the water system (i.e. PDF, shapefile, verbal definition). If primary data is unavailable, secondary data was utilized to determine service area boundaries (i.e. Certificate of Convenience and Necessity (CCN), Census Designated Place shapefile from U.S Census Bureau.)
New water systems are added, and contact information is updated for existing water systems on an annual basis. Service area maps are updated every 5 years. ADWR cannot verify the spatial accuracy of the information contained on this map.
The most recent annual update was 3/24/2022.
The most recent service area update was 3/24/2022.
descript.purpose: The purpose of this feature class is to provide service area boundaries for community water systems regulated by the Arizona Department of Water Resources.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
